title: I don't know how many times we have to say it; N E R F P Y K E
body: This champion is fucking stupid and only picked by edgelords who don't know what support is. On top of that, he's actually more broken than Zed/Talon/any other assassin. He can literally go full mental boom and walk head first into the enemy team in a 5v1 and if they don't kill him instantaneously he uses his fucking instant Zac leap with a stun and goes invisible while moving faster than the average velocity of fuck boy and popping his 7th item, {{item:3083}}. Nerf that shit or remove it from this game.
